name: MICROFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a completely online, channel for buying, selling or renting residential and commercial properties. With Patabadlo, searching for a home or an office space is incredibly uncomplicated and quick. With no layer in-between, Patabadlo enables you to buy, rent or sell properties by following a few simple steps. Our expert team is always alert and eager to assist you in your search.

In the real estate industry of India, there is a lot of ambiguity and many intermediaries to lengthen your property search. Hence through Patabadlo, we attempted to organize as much disordered data as possible and employ a scientific method to make property search hassle-free for you.

Our technology-enabled digital platform is the ideal solution for today’s busy and on-the-go generation. If you are looking to buy or rent a home or an office, you would find a vast range of choicest properties as per your preferences and if you want to sell your property, again, you would be able to do so without any road-block.

Patabadlo deals only with resale properties; hence, it goes without saying that, you won’t have to deal with legalities like GST, RERA compliance etc.
name: Patabadlo.com

idea:
A leading advisory and solutions company with end-to-end capabilities, Nvizion helps organizations deliver best digital experiences. From digital transformation & platform development to introducing new architectures and innovation, Nvizion designs and delivers unique digital ecosystems.

With global presence across US, UK and India, Nvizion takes pride in helping businesses road map and implement their customers online journey maximizing their ROI and enhancing CSAT for their end users.  Our technology portfolio includes – SAP C4/HANA, Oracle Commerce, Data Management (PIM & MDM), BPM and IDQ, Mobile commerce, Web and mobile application optimization, UX Design, Content Management.

We do lot of product development work and have developed “Nitrogen Hyperscale commerce” and “Nitrogen Sense” product.We have been a preferred partner of choice for many SMB’s & Fortune 500 customers globally creating high-performing commerce solutions that enable clients to successfully evolve and compete in the digital economy.
name: Nvizion Solutions

idea: We are in Performance Engineering, Business Mobility, Cross Platform Mobile Apps, Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, eCommerce, Payment Processing, Process Automation, Workflow Management
name: MSCALEUP TECHNOLOGY SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The conventional e-learning training modules deliver one sided information with limited interactions often becoming monotonous and thereby restricting the level of understanding of employees. This dilutes the objective of such learning thereby wasting time and money invested by organizations.

DistinctiveGMP aims at providing immersive trainings to Industrial and IT professionals helping them to learn in an interactive way thereby increasing the overall grasping and exchange of apt information to perform important organizational functions with utmost efficiency.

We deliver the best quality Virtual and Augmented Reality trainings and experiences following an agile software development approach enabling us to have maximum interaction with the client. This helps us to deliver immersive learnings on time while exceeding the client expectation.
name: DISTINCTIVEGMP LLP

idea: We are a company based out of Mumbai, that offers eco-friendly gifting solutions for retail and corporate. We support rural artisans by purchasing their wares and reselling them, thus generating a sustainable livelihood for them. We also develop our own designs of stationery products and apparel.
name: REGALO EXQUISITE LLP

idea:
"Only amateurs attack machines; professionals target people" -- Bruce Schneier

We are an email security firm specialised in Outbound Email Security primarily focused to address the BEC [Business Email Compromise] problems and provide Email Anti-Fraud / Anti-Phishing Solution to Companies.


As per FBI, Email Fraud and Email Phishing Attacks have caused $26 Billion losses worldwide in just last 3 years.

[https://www.ic3.gov/media/2019/190910.aspx]

In one of India's largest cyber thefts, Chinese fraudsters stole ₹130 Crore from the local unit of Italian multinational Technimont.


There is absolutely NO limit for the abuse that can happen due to spoofed business/corporate email addresses. Damage can be done FOR various reasons BY the competition OR disgruntled/unhappy/angry/dejected employees OR hackers/crackers/cyber-criminals.


With our unique capabilities, we at StopSpoof specialize in detecting, identifying, blocking, preventing & protecting from all types of BEC attacks in order to prevent the loss of revenues and confidential data, damage to your customers/vendors/employees/partners, and most importantly negative impact on your company's brand reputation.


StopSpoof is here to SOLVE that problem and protect the companies permanently from future BEC (Business Email Compromise) attacks orchestrated by cyber-criminals and fraudsters.


Visit www.StopSpoof.com for more details.


#BEC #BusinessEmailCompromise #EmailAuthentication #EAC #EmailFraud #EmailPhishing #Phishing #EmailSpoofing #EmailScam #CEOEmailFraud #EmailSecurity #CyberSecurity #Security #InvoiceScam #SpearPhishingAttack #DMARC #SPF #DKIM #DomainSpoofing #IdentityTheft #ImpersonationFraud #CISO #CTO #CIO #CDO #CMO #CEO #SecOps #InfoSec #WhatTheFraud #StopSpoof
name: AKINZIN PRIVATE LIMITED
